description_zh: 小众软件是一个分享、体验、评测电脑软件、手机应用、互联网产品的网站
description_en: Minority Software is a website that shares, experiences, and reviews computer software, mobile applications, and Internet products.
submitRequirements_zh: 需要符合站内的投稿要求，如果是收费或者需要注册，需要标明
submitRequirements_en: It is necessary to meet the submission requirements of the website. If it is a paid submission or requires registration, it should be clearly indicated.
rating_zh: 提交软件、应用、服务，也可以是数码产品。发布成功后会同步到X
rating_en: Submit software, applications, services, or digital products. After successful publication, they will be synchronized to X.
